summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 70th Street, from 28th Avenue Northwest, to a connection with the existing pavement on 32nd Avenue Northwest, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7671 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
